Text: Ugh, I'm getting an error saying that the file isn't compatible with Windows 64 bit. Anyone now how to fix it?
Torrent works perfectly, download and mount with Daemon tools. Couldn't be simpler ;)
it wont let me save game! helppppp!

I did what mc1000 said.
Nevertheless it does crash after completing the first mission :(
Worked perfectly, best version of this game.
It keeps on crashing everytime... any solution for this?
Doesnt work on 64bit, save yourself some trouble... :|

For everybody with an x64 operating system, use DOSbox.
1. Mount image with daemon tools or other emulator
2. start dosbox
3. mount cd drive and harddisk (root!) in DOSbox
4. go to cd drive and install
5. swap to harddisk and play!
